article.description: David Tairu scored 13 of his 15 points in the second half Sunday to help Texas Tech beat Liberty 79-71.
article.headline: David Tairu's late surge lifts Texas Tech past Liberty
article.linkText: Tairu's late surge lifts Texas Tech past Liberty
article.story: LUBBOCK, Texas -- David Tairu scored 13 of his 15 points in the second half Sunday to help Texas Tech beat Liberty 79-71. The Red Raiders (3-1) once again used a big push after halftime to open the game up after trailing 30-26 at the break. John Roberson and Tairu led the charge, scoring a combined 22 points in the opening eight minutes of the second half. Roberson and Brad Reese each finished with 14 points, while Robert Lewandowski added 13. As they did in Friday night's victory over Stephen F. Austin, the Red Raiders struggled in the first half from the outside. Liberty (2-3) took a 19-10 lead 8 minutes into the contest. Evan Gordon led the Flames with 18 points. John Brown had 10 points and 14 rebounds for Liberty.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
